name: racketmanager-plugin
description: Build tools for the RacketManager WordPress plugin

scripts.build: esbuild src/js/index.js --bundle --outfile=dist/js/racketmanager.js --format=esm --sourcemap --target=es2020 && esbuild src/js/admin/functions.js src/js/admin/ajax.js src/js/admin/draggable.js src/js/admin/utils.js --outdir=dist/js/admin --bundle --format=esm --sourcemap --target=es2020 && esbuild css/style.css css/admin.css css/modal.css css/print.css --outdir=dist/css --sourcemap
scripts.build:prod: esbuild src/js/index.js --bundle --outfile=dist/js/racketmanager.js --format=esm --minify --target=es2020 && esbuild src/js/index.js --bundle --outfile=dist/js/racketmanager.min.js --format=esm --minify --target=es2020 && esbuild src/js/admin/functions.js src/js/admin/ajax.js src/js/admin/draggable.js src/js/admin/utils.js --outdir=dist/js/admin --bundle --format=esm --minify --target=es2020 && esbuild src/js/admin/functions.js --outfile=dist/js/admin/functions.min.js --bundle --format=esm --minify --target=es2020 && esbuild src/js/admin/ajax.js --outfile=dist/js/admin/ajax.min.js --bundle --format=esm --minify --target=es2020 && esbuild src/js/admin/draggable.js --outfile=dist/js/admin/draggable.min.js --bundle --format=esm --minify --target=es2020 && esbuild src/js/admin/utils.js --outfile=dist/js/admin/utils.min.js --bundle --format=esm --minify --target=es2020 && esbuild css/style.css css/admin.css css/modal.css css/print.css --outdir=dist/css --minify && esbuild css/style.css --outfile=dist/css/style.min.css --minify && esbuild css/admin.css --outfile=dist/css/admin.min.css --minify && esbuild css/modal.css --outfile=dist/css/modal.min.css --minify && esbuild css/print.css --outfile=dist/css/print.min.css --minify
